Text:
720p? What the fuck? The first one is 320x176 and the second one is 624x352. Both are as far from 720p as you can get.

Screenshot: http://bayimg.com/eAoDMAaDJ.

Not so long ago one was able to trust the search results and titles. Now all you get is a reminder to check the file sizes and everything humanly possible before downloading anything.

Would not recommend this torrent to anyone.
